title: Beachfront Boutique Living - LIP 038
details: LIP-038 A stunning boutique beachfront villa situated in the heart of the tourism area on the South West coast of Sri Lanka. This villa offers a fresh contemporary elegance and includes five air-conditioned suites with en-suite bathrooms, all suites have stunning sea views. Two lounges, indoor and outdoor living and dining areas and a swimming pool completes the ground floor layout with bedrooms and a rooftop terrace on the three floors above. The kitchen, laundry and staff accommodation are separate and on the ground floor. Positioned on one of Sri Lanka’s most beautiful beaches which has a protective reef creating a lagoon and ensures safe year-round swimming, a place to kick back, relax and enjoy all that Sri Lanka has to offer. Unawatuna is 5 minutes away and with easy access to Galle Fort and the Southern Expressway.
